title: You can take them out of China, you can’t take the China out

replies.msg:
You can take them out of China, you can’t take the China out of them



This is why we HKers refuse to to be call Chinese

They just operate in a completely different mind set.

Not to mention freedom of speech doesn’t include hate speech.
Something they can never understand.
